comments.author: Marcel Reutegger
comments.body:
Use resource filtering in jackrabbit-core and ${pom.version} as the value for 'jcr.repository.version' in repository.properties.

At the same time I also changed the repository vendor URL to jackrabbit.apache.org (used to be www.apache.org).

Fixed in revision: 541652

comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body: Merged to the 1.3 branch in revision 544285.

description:
The repository descriptor 'jcr.repository.version' always shows 1.0-dev.

The value should reflect the current jackrabbit version.
summary: Use correct version number in repository descriptor
